tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ******** ******** ** *** **** ******* * **** ********* *** ******* *** **** *** ********* *** **** *** ** ***** **** *** ******** ** ********** I had visited for Root canol. He explained the diagnosis and the cure very patiently and kept updating me every step of the way. His staff is also very prompt, polite and helpful in scheduling or re- scheduling your appointments. Overall a big thumbs up to Dr. Shailesh Rojekar and his setup. All the best for Prudental Clinic....!!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
Impressed with the general upkeep  & ambience of the clinic  . Doctor’ s explanation of the dental issue , various options available , approximate estimate of the treatment & timeline is noteworthy.Doctor’s post graduate stint at the prestigious University college , London increased confidence in his abilities. Overall good experience .
- Area for improvement: 
 1. Filling of the history form is little time consuming . Can be done either on iPad or in advance by email. 
2. Time to replace the  rickety lift at Rajan House or keep a lift man . Opening  & closing the manual doors of the lift  is quite a task. 
3. Ground floor entry  has few steps. It would help if on both sides handle bars are fitted on the wall for support .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a great experience with Dr. Shailesh and his team. They were very professional, friendly and gentle. I needed several fillings and they did an excellent job. The procedure was painless and quick, and they explained everything clearly. I was very impressed with the quality of their work and the cleanliness of their office. I highly recommend PruDental !

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Went to get checkup for braces advice for first time for my daughter. 
Clinic is very swanky and doctor was well cultured and friendly. 

However, the disappointment was that Doctor carried out various procedures without taking consent or informing its usefulness. Ended up with *********** ********** *** hefty bill of  Rs. 6300 against expectation of Rs 1000 consultation fees.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Rojekar really put me at ease. He explained my issue in detail and how he was going to fix it. The fees are reasonable. The clinic was very clean and overall it was a great experience. Thank you for all your work!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Never have I found a dentist who does the job so beautifully. Sir explained me the process and his in-depth understanding made me immediately trust him and made me feel my teeth would be in safe hands.
I didn’t expect my tooth would look so perfect as if its just the original one. Thats some art.
I am going to be visiting the doctor again for a professional cleaning and I am glad I found a dentist for life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is very ************** ************  friendly and highly skilled professional. His Prabhadevi clinic is very conveniently located, well designed and has well trained staff. He is the best dental specialist among all the dentist I have ever visited.  Highly recommended to visit Dr. Shailesh Rojekar.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Place is clean and spacious with all modern equipments 
It was my first visit but doctor made you comfortable and explained the problem and treated immediately.

Although I did not understand the consultation charges over and above the treatment charges.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Very rare trait , specially with people who are highly specialized skilled professionals, to have a sense of humor. Easy to talk to . As it is said in Hindi “ Apnapun bolne mein” . 
Very pleasant interaction with very satisfactory treatment. Dedication towards the profession is evident by the high level of standards and quality of equipment/ implements used . 
A very memorable experience. 
Thank you

review: He talked about the dental problems n how to get over them with ease n without pain n made us comfortable n made us realise that dental problems today r solved without pain .. I think this was most comforting realising my threshold for pain is literally in minus .. n my visually challenged sister also felt most comfortable.. as he kept on telling her what he was going to do next n she want to visit him again..

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Overall it was okayish. for Dental care if is recommended if you decide what you want. The doctor will try to recommend cleaning and other services so you pay higher. I went for cavity pain and instead he suggested cleaning and whitening of teeths. The doctor is friendly and good to talk to. But would have been best of he focused more on treatment than service.
reply_text: Can you identify yourself, please! This will help us in checking our records. Also cost wise, cleaning is one of the cheapest treatments!
